customerService.description: Quickly addressing customer needs, providing clear communication, and effectively resolving issues. Focuses on delivering a positive customer experience through empathy, quick responsiveness, and a commitment to exceed expectations, fostering long-term relationships.
customerService.availability: Services are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to provide a high level of convenience for customers.

services.description1: We excel in express transportation options at discounted prices.
services.description2: Develop our shipping service or shipping to the port of the customer’s country.
services.description3: One of the services that we are proud to offer to our success partners and valued customers.

header.title: Ready to start crossing borders!
header.subtitle: For supporting different people’s needs in China importing business, we offered 3 plans to meet all your needs

list.title: Free package
features: Sourcing products and obtaining quotes from suppliers.
Consult about import and export, certificates, etc.
Air freight charges 36 SAR per kilo
Sea freight starts from 1500 for 1 CBM.

list.title: Plus package
features: Sourcing products and getting quotes from suppliers.
Customize and design products and packages.
Air freight at 34 riyals per kilo.

list.title: VIP packages
features: Sourcing products and obtaining quotations from suppliers.
Professional product photography for e-commerce. FBA, FBN
Month free warehouse and product assembly.
1300 Saudi riyals for sea freight for CBM

shipments.title: Add New Shipment

ourServices.Product sourcing description: Our local team can source and communicate with selected factories in China more quickly. You can spend more time with your family or expand your business. We have a 10,000-square-meter warehouse for you as temporary storage. Our quality inspector will do a careful quality inspection before shipping the goods out.
ourServices.Quality Inspection description: We provide free quality inspection and temporary warehouse storage service. Our inspectors will open most of your cartons to check quality and specifications, and the record will be sent to you through HD photos and videos.
ourServices.Production Management description: We simplify the whole process of production in China: confirm samples, place order to each supplier, do quality control, manage production time. All this reduces risks for you and guarantees that the goods will arrive on time.
